meaningMnemonic:
If 在留 is <kanji>residence</kanji>, then the verb version of that would be <vocabulary>to reside</vocabulary>.

Like 在留, this is also a more formal term. You might encounter it at the immigration office, but you probably won't hear it in everyday conversation.
readingMnemonic: The reading comes from 在留 so you should be able to read this one already!
